about_the_game:
Your Lover is a desktop pet game.

Instructions for Use:

  • The game features face movement that follows the mouse, as well as support for dragging and zooming in/out.

  • You can rotate the view using the right mouse button.

Content:

  • The game includes an adorable desktop pet character.
